devdoc.details: Forked from https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-labs/blob/3887ab77b8adafba4a26ace002f3a684c1a3388b/upgradeability_ownership/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol Modifications: 1. Consolidate OwnableStorage into this contract (7/13/18) 2. Reformat, conform to Solidity 0.6 syntax, and add error messages (5/13/20) 3. Make public functions external (5/27/20)

OwnershipTransferred(address,address).details: Event to show ownership has been transferred

params.newOwner: representing the address of the new owner
params.previousOwner: representing the address of the previous owner

constructor.details: The constructor sets the original owner of the contract to the sender account.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

userdoc.notice: The Ownable contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control functions
